AddressInfo.Title: Babington Hospital
AddressInfo.AccessComments: Charge points are located at the parking spaces on the right side of the car park, 20m from the main (South) entrance. Charge points are for Hospital users, visitors & staff only during normal working week; unrestricted evenings & weekends. Length of stay limited during working hours to active charging period only or duration of Hospital appointment / visiting, as space is required for Hospital users. No time restrictions evenings & weekends. The only exception to this is Hospital pool vehicles, which will have a permanent parking space. No parking fees.
